name: MASVS-PLATFORM - MASVS-PLATFORM-3
description: The app uses the user interface securely.

rules.description: PLATFORM-3: Finding Sensitive Information in Auto-Generated Screenshots
rules.note:
It is recommended to set the FLAG_SECURE option to protect from Auto-Generated Screenshots issue.
Please note that, When the application goes into background, a screenshot of the current activity is taken which may leak sensitive information.

rules.description: PLATFORM-3: Checking for Sensitive Data Disclosure Through the User Interface
rules.note:
It is recommended not to disclose any sensitive data such as password, card details, etc. in the clear-text format via User Interface.
Make sure that the application is masking sensitive user input by using the inputType="textPassword" attribute. It is useful to mitigate risks such as shoulder surfing.
